javadoc: The header renderer for GhidraTable. If the table model implements SortedTableModel, then an icon will be displayed in the header of the currently sorted column representing ascending and descending order.

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if sorted in ascending order, false if descending.
@return true if sorted in ascending order, false if descending
methods.name: isSortedAscending
methods.comment: Returns true if sorted in ascending order, false if descending.

return.comment: true if sorted in ascending order, false if descending

name: GTableHeaderRenderer
comment:
The header renderer for GhidraTable.
 If the table model implements SortedTableModel, then
 an icon will be displayed in the header of the currently sorted
 column representing ascending and descending order.
